entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early in the evening. Snow beginning early in the evening. Local snowfall amount 2 cm.
